channel.title: What is Boolean
channel.description: can you tell me what boolean does in a script, because me friend is using boolean in his scripts. can you tell me also how to use it. His script he made was a runescape password hacker.

item.title: What is Boolean
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Boolean is the most simple of variable types. It holds either True or False (as it says in SCAR help when you press F1 :rolleyes:)

Examples:

var dBool: Boolean; begin dBool:= True; if dBool = True then writeln('This will print, since it's true'); if dBool then writeln('This will also print'); if not dBool then writeln('This will only print with dBool is False'); end

procedure Switch(var dBool: Boolean); dBool:= not dBool; end

Read full topic

item.title: What is Boolean
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

Yea a boolean is true or false. Simple as that
